original_text: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.
korean_text: 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나신 후에야 제자들이 이 말씀하신 것을 기억하고 성경과 예수께서 하신 말씀을 믿었더라

sentences.original_text: When therefore he was risen from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났을 때

sentences.original_text: that he had said this unto them
and the word which Jesus had said
